attributes.title: Great App!
attributes.review: This is a good app to keep you informed on all things Donald Trump. It is also good at connecting the community. Trump supporters can talk to each other and find ways to spread the word to other people who are still undecided. The app also provides great insight into how individuals can volunteer and donate to the cause. By downloading and using this app, you can help MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN! ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸

attributes.title: THIS APP IS MAGA
attributes.review:
If you're a Trump supporter, or someone on the fence but interested in learning more about Trump & his campaign to MAGA, you have got to get this app. It's amazing. Easy to navigate, social features, fun point system, and lots of ways to keep up to date on the Trump campaign! Just like Trump, this app is first class all the way.

Download it & let's Make America Great Again!

attributes.title: Great app (but some problems need fixing)
attributes.review: The app is amazing and works smooth, doesn't lag or crash. The only problem is the inability to register task completion when I watch the Trump Ad that is supposed to give 25 AP. (It doesn't) please fix this and great work. Will be waiting for in-app updates such as the prizes and such

attributes.title: Best App in App Store
attributes.review:
Without a doubt this is the best App in the App store. With this app you defeat your enemies by using a slingshot and sending cute birds flying at then.

The Democrats (pigs) are trying to steal our eggs and other stuff. The pigs are so ugly. One has seizures while another tries to play different color birds against each other for some reason?

attributes.title: This app is great!! So easy to stay informed and up to date with everything and it's fun!
attributes.review: Donald Trump has opened a lot people's eyes to politics and this app is an awesome way for everyone to stay in touch with what's happening and feel like they are part the change that is so desperately needed in this country!

attributes.title: Amazing App!
attributes.review: This is easily my favorite app now. It's a nice blend of social media, ranking competition, and important information. I suggest this app to both supporters and the undecided voters. This app is completely fair, and displays all of the policies of Trump as well, no distractions from the liberal media. Try and level up, and beat your friends!

attributes.title: This is a good app ....Go Trump
attributes.review: The reason this app is good and going to be even better, is because the people that follow Trump...not the media but the people can really show there voice and opinion. Simply by checking in at trump rallies and posting trumps good news not the media news... On this awesome app!! ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ˜Š

attributes.title: It's a great app, that much I can tell you
attributes.review: Believe me, it's one of the greatest apps that has ever been made.  In fact, it's so good that there is a book being written about it called 'The Art of the App.'  Download it now if you want to start winning and make America Great Again.

attributes.title: This is a must have for every true patriot!
attributes.review: This app is great. You can get news and content that the biased media will never show. It is matter of time before TNN is born in my opinion regardless of the election outcome. Our country needs to come out of the liberal induced coma and be great again.

attributes.title: Make America Great Again!
attributes.review: Donald Trump turns everything he touches into gold and this app is no exception.  It's very helpful in bringing all of the important campaign information into one easy-to-access place.  Download now to help Trump win and make America great and safe again!
